briefdescription.para: Build the phone lextree for all transitions out of state from_state.

detaileddescription.para: Return the root node of this tree. Also, return a linear linked list of all allocated fsg_pnode_t nodes in *alloc_head (for memory management purposes).
alloc_head: head of linear list of allocated nodes updated by fsg_psubtree_init().

briefdescription.para: Dump the list of nodes in the given lextree to the given file.

detaileddescription.para: alloc_head: head of linear list of allocated nodes updated by fsg_psubtree_init().

briefdescription.para: Compute the left and right context CIphone sets for each state.

memberdef.argsstring: (fsg_model_t *fsg, dict_t *dict, dict2pid_t *d2p, bin_mdef_t *mdef, hmm_context_t *ctx, int32 wip, int32 pip)
memberdef.name: fsg_lextree_init

briefdescription.para: Create, initialize, and return a new phonetic lextree for the given FSG.
Print an FSG lextree to a file for debugging.
Set all flags on in the given context bitvector.

memberdef.argsstring: (fsg_lextree_t *lextree, fsg_pnode_t *root, fsg_glist_linklist_t **curglist, fsg_link_t *fsglink, int16 *lclist, int16 *rclist, fsg_pnode_t **alloc_head)
memberdef.name: psubtree_add_trans

briefdescription.para: Mark the given pnode as inactive (for search).
The collection of all the lextrees for the entire FSM.
